attributes.action: stop all uk payments of foreign aid & all further payments to the EU immediately
attributes.additional_details:
, The elderly can retire like the ones in the past did at a reasonable age so that they can enjoy their final years & not have to work till they die & finally make sure our disabled people have what they need to live & not be told that they have to work even though they cannot!!
Billions going out from the Btitish peoples pocket to the EU & in foreign aid
Top lawyer said we owe the EU nothing
attributes.background: The UK government to cease immediately any & all payments made to the EU regarding membership & stop all foreign aid payments until such time that our own NHS is back to where it should be & can look after people who are sick in this country,
